Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1983...
Released by San Francisco on 2/20/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/23/1983 to a 2-year deal worth $6,100,000 per year...
Released by Los Angeles on 2/24/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 3/2/1983 to a minor league deal...
Earned first career win on 4/26/1988...
Injured on 7/29/1989 with a Spasms Back, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/2/1994 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/26/1995 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Traded from Minnesota to Pittsburgh on 4/18/1996 (Going to PIT: P J. McDowell, P J. Robinson. Going to MIN: P R. Seanez)...
